alert.note: Alert for Clark; Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:51AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLARK AND SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 250 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Shortville, or 15 miles southeast of Neillsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... City Point, Ballard Road And Pray Avenue, The Black River Correctional Center, Potters Flowage, Seventeen Flowage, The Cunningham Airfield, Pray and Nevins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
